summary: Use this API to batch ship packages by providing multiple package IDs
description:
Use this API to batch ship packages by providing multiple package IDs. This API is available for TikTok shipping orders as well as seller shipping orders.   - TikTok Shipping: Schedule a package handover time for TikTok Shipping carriers to pickup a package from the Seller.  - Seller Shipping: Seller arranges their own shipping, and upload a tracking_number and shipping_provider_id. Package ID can be obtained from Get Order Detail. Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.  Get by API Get Authorization Shop
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: Input list of packages you would like to batch ship.

children.description: Possible values: - PICKUP: A shipping provider will pickup the package(s) from the seller's pickup address. - DROP_OFF: The seller will need to drop off the package(s) at a designated location.
The start date and time of the package pickup time slot. Unix timestamp.
The end date and time of the package pickup time slot. Unix timestamp.

Only needed for seller shipping packages. Check the delivery_option `field in Get Package Detail to see how to differentiate between TikTok shipping and seller shipping. Use the `shipping_provider_id retrieved from the Get Shipping Providers API and upload the corresponding tracking number.
For packages with the SEND_BY_SELLER delivery option type (seller shipping), you must provide the package's tracking number.

For packages with the SEND_BY_SELLER delivery option type (seller shipping), you must provide the shipping provider information. Please use the Get Shipping Providers API to obtain the shipping_provider_id.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: Return list of possible errors during package batch shipment attempt.

error_codes.message: System timeout. If this error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
Failed to ship package. Products under the Phones & Tablets category cannot be shipped together with other items in the same package. Please split the order.
Failed to ship package. If you are shipping multiple products under the Phones & Tablets category, they must be shipped in individual packages. Please split the order to continue.
No available shipping services for this request. Please modify the package weight or check the recipient address. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.

The shipment failed due to an invalid postal code. Please ask the buyer to edit the address. If the address cannot be changed, you may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the product name is invalid. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the buyer's recipient district is invalid. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.

The shipment failed because the delivery address is too long. Please ask the buyer to shorten the address. If the address cannot be changed, you may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
The shipment failed because product is oversized. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the package is overweight. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the weight of the SKU exceeds the allowed limit. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the SKU dimensions exceed the allowed limits. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the number of items in the package exceeds the allowed limit.
Fail to ship package because the package dimensions exceed the allowed limits. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the package's circumference exceeds the allowed limit. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the SKU name is invalid. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.

Fail to ship package because the longest dimension of the package exceeds the allowed limit. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the buyer and/or seller addresses are invalid. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the buyer recipient address is invalid. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Fail to ship package because the seller shipping address is invalid. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
This tracking number cannot be matched to any carrier, please check the tracking number and upload again.
System timeout. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
System timeout. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
System cache error, please try again.
System process error, please try again later.
System process error, please try again later.
System process error, please try again later.
Failed to ship. Please ensure an invoice is uploaded before shipping.
Package item has after-sale request, please process the after-sale request first.
Package not found. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
Package does not allow for Ready-to-Ship (RTS). If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance
Package item has after-sale request, please process the after-sale request first.
Package is not complete. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
Invalid tracking number or provider ID. Please double check and try again.
Duplicate tracking number.
Package has already been delivered.
The package does not belong to the current shop.
Package has already been shipped.
Cannot complete the operation when order is cancelled.
Fail to ship package because the shipment time is outside of the pick-up time slot.
No available shipping services for this request due to missing pick-up time slot. Please contact customer service for assistance.
System process error, please try again later.
Failed to ship. You may cancel the order without penalty by selecting the following reason: Unable to deliver to buyer address.
Internal system timeout error. If the error persists, please contact the platform for assistance.
